top_comments_top.body:
Double check with your son that this is what he wants.

An 11 year old is capable of understanding the challenge idea, but if he just wants to group up and play fortnite with his buddies, let him do that.

It's his birthday after all.
Mario kart and Mario party are both great group games and , in my opinion , lots of fun for almost any age.
Get a strike in Wii bowling

Play the mine cart level in donkey kong country.

They will all stop there.
